about.heading: About
about.yoganandaBio: Paramahansa Yogananda (1893–1952) is widely regarded as one of the preeminent spiritual figures of our time. Born in Gorakhpur, India, he came to America in 1920 and spent the next three decades introducing millions of seekers to the ancient science of Kriya Yoga meditation and the art of balanced spiritual living.
about.srfDescription: Founded in 1920 by Paramahansa Yogananda, Self-Realization Fellowship is dedicated to carrying on his spiritual and humanitarian work — fostering a spirit of greater understanding and goodwill among the diverse peoples and nations of our global family, and helping those of all cultures and nationalities to realize and express more fully in their lives the beauty, nobility, and divinity of the human spirit.
